news.title: Chip stocks rally to start 2026 after third-straight winning year
news.description: Investors piled into the winning artificial intelligence-adjacent sector following another big year of gains.

news.title: SpaceX stock debut is the big market event of 2026. Why Musk's venture could be biggest IPO ever
news.description: Investors have already thrown their weight behind the company ahead of its planned IPO.

news.title: Berkshire Hathaway shares dip as Warren Buffett exits and Greg Abel era begins
news.description: Investors digested the formal end of Warren Buffett's six-decade tenure as chief executive and the start of a new era under successor Greg Abel.
